Articles.Content: These are... interesting. At least a diversity of art styles. I like Nassaults. But for accuracy of looking like the real Valentina, legend1986 has the best.
It's the expression in nothingSpecial's drawing that does it for me. Bad-ass all the way.
I have a paper drawing drawn out, but ineed to color it... it's from a future envisioned story, near the end... i may nort fiinish it though... ski trip tomorrow...

First I was like "You totally not going to call her Valentina and then expect me to not base anything on Vostok-6. Or better both on it and on Vostok-1. Oh damn, why not make a clear image that she flies in some sort of kerbalized Vostok from cyrillic-writing country and that's first kerbal in space by showing some other kerbals being in awe and some box with "ÃÂÃâ€¢ Ãâ€¢Ãâ€ÃÂ" sticker".

Then I was like "Nah, whatever. No one cares for my not so subtle attemts at influencing KSP lore. Just have some bad-ass spacewoman that is not defined as a female by liberal application of lipstick or eyelashes or pink".

http://i.gyazo.com/7cc98fa13264ecae3a6d1059bc41f3f3.png

I like that one the most.

This is really cool. I've been working on mine non stop since I found out about this.

If I was a kerbal I woud be this one http://i.imgur.com/RO4x1H7.png

But the one I think is most pleasing to my eye would have to be red cow's http://th02.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2015/046/d/6/ksp_first_girl_on_laythe_by_george_eracleous-d8i3cy3.jpg

I'm looking forward to showing mine when it's done! I learned to play the game by drawing out guides from youtube tutorials. It just didn't make sense to me until I did that and I'm excited because this is like, girl themed and it's an art contest. Yeeee!

I couldn't resist...

http://i59.tinypic.com/muz9zq.jpg

I love this one.
I want either my second entry, TheRedCow's entry, or Greg's entry to win.

I couldn't resist...

http://i59.tinypic.com/muz9zq.jpg

I find it kind of strange that people picked up on yours, but not mine.

good one though

I don't know who's this is and as such I take no credit for it. I really like the way she looks and as such thought I'd share it with the community.

http://img0.joyreactor.cc/pics/post/Kerbal-Space-Program-%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B5-KSP-art-kerbals-1424698.jpeg

Gotta say, this is my favorite so far. Anyone have a clue who the artist is?

I have this illustration ready since some time ago for Renaissance Compilation, waiting to the best moment to release... but I don't gonna have a better opportunity to show it than here and now. So here goes my input:

I post it in a screen resolution to better placement in the forum, a much higher resolution is available.

No offence, but i dont really like any of them. they just don't look like womam like or feminine to me, some of them are just a standard kerbals with lipstick and long hair. But thats just my opinion

The only one i really liked. was this one

It actually looks like a woman.

<snipped by moderation>

Edited February 18, 2015 by Old Man Jenkins
I just had to make someone old, couldn't live myself. It may be poorly drawn, but I just wanted to get her out there.

I just had to make someone old, couldn't live myself. It may be poorly drawn, but I just wanted to get her out there.

I'm watching you, Wazowski. Always watching...

I am no artist, but I know what I like when I see it. There are some very very good submissions shared so far! I'm not fond of the ones which look identical to the male Kerbals, but the others are well thought out and implemented. Such Kerbals will really make the game look much better, IMHO.

I'm watching you, Wazowski. Always watching...

A friend told me the same thing, funny.

Here's my entry. I'm sure it's not going to win, but it does bring a tear to my eye thinking about it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I thought about it all day. I want to do second entry but still not sure. I got few concept sketches (they aren't entries!! Only sketches, messy sketches) you can tell me what do you think and what concept is best

I thought Valentina could do with a little something extra to distinguish and enhance her beyond the other Kerbal gender, so here she is, Valentina with antenna - the ability to telepathically make cheeky comments to the gals back at mission control and send science data!

First I was like "You totally not going to call her Valentina and then expect me to not base anything on Vostok-6. Or better both on it and on Vostok-1. Oh damn, why not make a clear image that she flies in some sort of kerbalized Vostok from cyrillic-writing country and that's first kerbal in space by showing some other kerbals being in awe and some box with "ÃÂÃâ€¢ Ãâ€¢Ãâ€ÃÂ" sticker".

Then I was like "Nah, whatever. No one cares for my not so subtle attemts at influencing KSP lore. Just have some bad-ass spacewoman that is not defined as a female by liberal application of lipstick or eyelashes or pink".

http://i.gyazo.com/7cc98fa13264ecae3a6d1059bc41f3f3.png

Excellent. I hope squad shares your artistic vision for female kerbals as well.

My picture's now coloured in sans the black of space because that would likely have ruined everything (my hand included):

As before, Valentina is studying a meteoroid while two newbies back at the shuttle have a problem...

I must say, there are some really good pieces here. Good work, folks

I don't know who's this is and as such I take no credit for it. I really like the way she looks and as such thought I'd share it with the community.

First woman in space - valentina vladimirovna Tereshkova
